entry.title: Vestra 2pc Jumpsuit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Jumpsuit
Price: 435.00

This structured two-piece set brings a modern edge to tailored dressing. The cropped vest features a V-neckline, front self-covered square buttons, and faux welt pocket detailing for a refined finish. Paired with high-waisted straight leg pants, designed with princess seams to elongate the frame, the look strikes a confident balance between sharp and minimal. The back slit of the vest adds a subtle point of interest while keeping the silhouette light and contemporary.

  • Cady Bi-Stretch
  • V-Neckline
  • Sleeveless
  • Self-Covered Square Buttons and Welt Pocket Details at Vest
  • Straight Leg Pants with Princess Seam Detailing
  • Hidden Center Back Zipper at Pant
  • Model Measurements: Height 5' 10", Waist 24", Bust 32 A", Hips 35"
  • Model is wearing Size 0
  • 6601749

entry.title: Evelina Jumpsuit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Dresses
Price: 435.00

The Evelina Jumpsuit blends fluid lines with sharp structure. Designed in crepe back satin, it features a one-shoulder neckline with a draped overlay sleeve that falls softly over one arm, creating a sculptural effect. The bodice is clean and fitted, while the straight-leg pants are tailored with side slits for added movement. Inseam pockets add functionality without interrupting the silhouette. A hidden zipper at the back ensures a seamless finish.

  • Crepe Back Satin
  • Asymmetrical Neckline
  • One Draped Off-Shoulder Short Sleeve
  • Inseam Pockets at Pants
  • Straight Leg with Side Slits
  • Hidden Center Back Zipper
  • Bodice Lined
  • Model Measurements: Height 5' 10", Waist 24", Bust 32 A", Hips 35"
  • Model is wearing Size 0
  • 6351754

entry.title: Sorelle Jumpsuit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Jumpsuit
Price: 485.00

The Sorelle Jumpsuit is crafted from crisp white denim, this jumpsuit blends structure and ease with thoughtful details throughout. The bodice features a sweetheart neckline with a modern cutout and wide shoulder straps, creating a flattering silhouette. High-waisted straight-leg pants elongate the figure, with a subtle cutout at the back waist. Finished with tonal topstitching and a hidden zipper closure, it’s a confident look designed for movement and presence.

  • White denim fabric
  • Sweetheart neckline with front cutout
  • Wide shoulder straps
  • Sleeveless
  • High-waisted straight-leg pants
  • Inseam pockets
  • Cutout detail at the back waist
  • Topstitching along princess seams
  • Hidden center back zipper
  • Bodice lined

entry.title: Kyria CB Jumpsuit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Jumpsuit
Price: 460.00

The Kyria CB faux two-piece jumpsuit blends modern design with a structured silhouette. The bodice features bold color blocking, highlighted by a square neckline and adjustable shoulder straps. A peplum waistline cinched with a self-belt and a sleek rectangular buckle enhances the shape, offering a flattering fit. Front faux welt pockets add a chic touch, while the bootcut pants elongate the legs for a polished finish.

  • Faux two-piece jumpsuit
  • Color-blocked design
  • Square neckline with adjustable straps
  • Self-belt with rectangular buckle
  • Peplum waist detail
  • Front faux welt pockets
  • Bootcut pants
  • Back zipper closure

entry.title: Mayra Jumpsuit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Jumpsuit
Price: 460.00

Mayra jumpsuit is designed to make a bold statement, blending elegance and comfort effortlessly. Featuring short sleeves and a mock neckline, it creates a sleek, modern silhouette. The top of this garment showcases a structured design with three visible seam lines run vertically from the neckline to the waist, enhancing the tailored fit and giving the garment a sleek, contoured look. The wide-leg pants and back keyhole cutout add a dramatic flair, making it perfect for any event.

  • Stretch jumpsuit with tailored bodice
  • Mock neckline with short sleeves
  • Back keyhole cutout with button closure
  • Wide-leg pants with pleated details
  • Hidden back zipper
  • Side seam pockets
  • Model is wearing a size 2 and her measurements are 5’10”, 32A” bust, 23” waist, 35” hips.

entry.title: Genesis CB Jumpsuit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Jumpsuit
Price: 435.00

This stunning mixed-media jumpsuit offers a blend of elegance and modern style. The textured lurex stretch knit bodice adds a touch of sparkle, while the halter neckline highlights your shoulders. Paired with high-waisted, ultra-flattering Isabella pants crafted from contrasting stretch crepe, this one-piece jumpsuit is both chic and comfortable. The hidden center back zipper ensures an easy step-in fit, making it perfect for any special occasion.

  • Textured lurex stretch knit bodice with a subtle shimmer

  • Contrast stretch crepe pants

entry.title: Brooklyn Jumpsuit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Black Halo
Type: Jumpsuit
Price: 460.00

An update to our Brooklyn Mini, the jumpsuit is cut from our Double Face Viscose Blend and is styled with a fjewel neckline, 3/4 sleeves with ruffle cuff and cropped tapered leg. Lined bodice with center back hidden zipper. Inseam measures 28". Self:62% Polyamide, 32% Viscose, 6% Elastane; Lining: 95% Polyamide, 5% Elastane. Dry clean with care. Made in the USA of imported materials.
